Name: Aviation Cocktail (Savoy spec.)
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry (& optional sugar rim).
Review: Tangy gin-laced lemon sourness with aromatic maraschino - too many of these and you really will be flying.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Aviation Cocktail (Savoy spec.) contains 171 calories
